overview: Collection of four short films from Falcon Studios. "Come'n Take It, If Ya Can!" — Self-confident loner Joe Andrews uses his stiff 10-inches in the most-unusual Falcon solo film yet. "Help Wanted" — Joe Andrews encounters Falcon superstar Dick Fisk when he responds to a Help Wanted sign on a warehouse door, and before you know it they're sixty-nining on a conveyor belt. "Rocks And Hard Places" — Superstar Al Parker and Falcon discovery Jeff Turk meet up with a friend along a mountain stream in the wild blue yonder. "PE-627" — Jeff Turk and gymnastics teammate Vince Clark are messing around in the locker room, when hunky young coach Kirk Mannheim returns for a heavy-duty three-way.
title: Help Wanted
